name: Tiny Galaxy (itch) (DrDDuck)
description:
Tiny Galaxy is a solo project that I have started working on for the One Game a Month #12 game jam in which the theme is small world. I will most likely keep working on the project after the game jam. The game is an action twin-stick shooter where you try to find fuel and parts for your ship while moving from planet to planet, defeating enemies that are in the way. 

Controls

WASD - Movement

left mouse button - shoot

Spacebar - Jump
